name: py-ipyrad

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
An interactive toolkit for assembly and analysis of restriction-site
associated genomic data sets (e.g., RAD, ddRAD, GBS) for population
genetic and phylogenetic studies.

dependencies.name: bedtools2
dependencies.description:
Collectively, the bedtools utilities are a swiss-army knife of tools for
a wide-range of genomics analysis tasks. The most widely-used tools
enable genome arithmetic: that is, set theory on the genome.

dependencies.name: bwa
dependencies.description: Burrow-Wheeler Aligner for pairwise alignment between DNA sequences.

dependencies.name: muscle
dependencies.description:
MUSCLE is one of the best-performing multiple alignment programs
according to published benchmark tests, with accuracy and speed that are
consistently better than CLUSTALW.

dependencies.name: py-cutadapt
dependencies.description:
Cutadapt finds and removes adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and
other types of unwanted sequence from your high-throughput sequencing
reads.

dependencies.name: py-future
dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: py-ipyparallel
dependencies.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.

dependencies.name: py-notebook
dependencies.description: Jupyter Interactive Notebook

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pysam
dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: samtools
dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format

dependencies.name: vsearch
dependencies.description: VSEARCH is a versatile open-source tool for metagenomics.
